thread.section_title: Topcashback Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Topcashback | topcashback.com
thread.title: Angela Delacruz

author: Angela Delacruz
title: Angela Delacruz
text: This site is great, I got an extra bonus when I first joined during a promotion as opposed to just referring people. The cashback on this site is also more than e**tes! I also like the automatic deposit into my bank account and if I wanted an amazon gift card then I get a certain percentage bonus. I do wish more instore offers were available and increasing the store inventory.
